languages.text: The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.
languages.original_text: При совершении атак {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} персонаж получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} за каждое затронутое существо.

traits.locale_text: Grants +10% critical hit chance and +25% critical damage during the first round of combat.
The wearer gains +5% parry reduction and dodge reduction to their melee area attacks for each creature targeted by that area attack.

The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

languages.text: При совершении атак {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} персонаж получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} за каждое затронутое существо.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

traits.locale_text: При совершении атак рукопашным оружием по области персонаж получает +5% к снижению парирования и снижению уклонения за каждое затронутое существо.
При совершении атак рукопашным оружием по области персонаж получает +5% к снижению парирования и снижению уклонения за каждое затронутое существо.

languages.text: 着用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}において、その範囲攻撃のターゲットとなる生物1匹につき、+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

traits.locale_text: 着用者は近接範囲攻撃において、その範囲攻撃のターゲットとなる生物1体につき、+5％の受け流し減少と回避減少を得る。

languages.text: 装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，区域内每有一名生物，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}就提高5%。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用近战范围攻击时，区域内每有一名生物，此次攻击的招架减免与闪避减免就提高5%。

languages.text: El portador gana +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} y de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} en sus ataques de área {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} por cada criatura objetivo del {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} en cuestión.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

traits.locale_text: El portador gana +5 % de reducción de parada y de reducción de esquiva en sus ataques de área cuerpo a cuerpo por cada criatura objetivo del ataque de área en cuestión.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}, und zwar für jede Kreatur, die von diesem {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} anvisiert wird.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält +5 % Parieren-Reduktion und Ausweichen-Reduktion auf seine Nahkampfangriffe, und zwar für jede Kreatur, die von diesem Flächenangriff anvisiert wird.

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur donne{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} de 5 % et{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de la créature ciblée.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque attaque de zone en mêlée de l'utilisateur réduit de 5 % la parade et l'esquive de la créature ciblée.

Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduit{/g} de 5 % la parade et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}esquive{/g} de la créature ciblée.
